attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In ancient Athens, every year all citizens were allowed to vote to ostracise one politician. The politician receiving most votes, and reaching a minimum number, was then barred from public life for ten years.

I believe that this is an effective expression of democracy, and would like to see it introduced to our system of government.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
